alert.note: Alert for Horry; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 31 at 11:35AM EDT until further notice by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Moderate to Major severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in South Carolina... Little Pee Dee River At Galivants Ferry affecting Marion and Horry Counties. For the Little Pee Dee River...including Galivants Ferry...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Pee Dee River at Galivants Ferry. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flood waters will affect 30 to 40 homes in the Fork Retch community near Nichols. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 8.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening and continue rising to a crest of 12.0 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by late tonight.
